TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityWithKey

summary.span: 定义公开实体键的实体类型。

span.span: Defines an entity type that exposes an entity key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口用于向对象服务公开实体键。This interface is used to expose the entity key to Object Services. 对象服务使用 属性来管理对象上下文中的对象。Object Services uses the property to manage objects in the object context. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)并[跟踪 POCO 实体中的更改](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::EntityKey ^ EntityKey { System::Data::EntityKey ^ get(); void set(System::Data::EntityKey ^ value); };
member this.EntityKey : System.Data.EntityKey with get, set

summary.span: 为实现此接口的实体类型的实例获取或设置 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for instances of entity types that implement this interface.

value.span: 实现此接口的实体类型实例的 。

span.span: The for instances of entity types that implement this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象服务使用 属性来管理对象上下文中的对象。Object Services uses the property to manage objects in the object context. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)并[跟踪 POCO 实体中的更改](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
